dl.dd: Amherst Shore Provincial Park is located on Route 366, the Sunrise Trail, 36 km (22 mi.) east of Amherst and 26 km (16 mi.) west of Pugwash.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: June 17 to Oct. 10 for the 2011 Season
Offers a 42-site woodland campground, picnic areas, showers/comfort station, and a walking trail leading to the unsupervised beach area.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
